metadata.title: CVE-2024-27433 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: clk:mediatek: mt7622-apmixedsys: Fix an error handling path inclk_mt8135_apmixed_probe() 'clk_data' is allocated withmtk_devm_alloc_clk_data(). So calling mtk_free_clk_data() explicitly in theremove function would lead to a double-free. Remove the redundant call.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
